Walking around world for green future
From the Mediterranean shores of Malta to the diverse landscapes of India, every step tells a story of climate resilience and hope.

I am Jaydip from Bhavnagar, Gujarat, an adventurer and nature lover. I worked as a trekking instructor with Invincible NGO and explored India on foot for 182 days, which gave me a deeper purpose in life.

I became a certified kayaking instructor and founded Gujarat’s first kayaking organization, where over 15,000 people trained. I am also a certified lifeguard and power paraglider, combining adventure with safety and skill.
My passion for travel and eco-tourism led me to study in Europe, and in 2025 I was invited to Greece for an international youth festival to inspire students and youth.
From certifications to creating organizations, each achievement represents a step towards inspiring and empowering others through adventure and nature conservation.
Pursued a comprehensive diploma in hospitality, tour, and travel management from a well-known institute in Surat, Gujarat, India.
Cleared the exam and interview of Malta's reputed college to study for a diploma in hospitality in Europe. International education achievement.
First solo traveler from Gujarat who traveled all over India by walking and hitchhiking for 182 days. Featured on TV channels, magazines, and social media.
Became a certified trekking instructor with Invincible NGO, India's largest trekking organization. Guided thousands of participants through their dream treks.
Passed India's toughest institute for watersports "NIWS" (National Institute of Watersports) exam in 2022. Founded Gujarat's first certified kayaking organization.
Successfully completed basic and advanced courses in power paragliding from NIMAS in 2023. Soaring through skies with certified expertise.
Climate Walker a tourist who travel around continents to spread climate awareness.
Join the epic 12,000 km journey from Malta to India - one step at a time, spreading climate awareness across 20 countries and countless communities.
617 Days. 18 Countries. One Planet. One Mission. Six distinct phases, each with unique challenges and discoveries.
Starting in Malta's ancient harbors, walking through Italy's diverse landscapes to Vatican City's spiritual heart.
bg-accented/50 p-2 rounded-md border border-muted border-dashed
Through Slovenia's Alps to Croatia's coast, across Bosnia's mountains and Serbia's plains.
Bulgaria's rose valleys to Greece's ancient paths, crossing into Turkey's gateway between continents.
Georgia's wine country to Armenia's ancient monasteries, crossing some of Earth's highest mountain passes.
Iran's vast deserts and ancient cities, experiencing Persian hospitality and climate adaptation.
Pakistan's mighty peaks to India's diverse landscapes, completing the epic transcontinental journey.
Your support makes this epic journey possible and helps spread climate awareness across continents.
